titleInfo.title: Arthur M. Oberfelder's Concert Series Program Cover

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 7 x 5 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: ''#717 Oberfelder program books''.

mods.abstract: Cover of the Arthur M. Oberfelder's Super Deluxe Concert Series featuring Margaret Truman, at the Denver Auditorium. Pioneer impresario Arthur Oberfelder organized a concert series that lasted until his death in 1954.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
